author: DistroTube
description:
These two amazing GNOME extensions add the ability for you to setup an automatic wallpaper changer; and every time your wallpaper changes, the accent color of your GTK theme/icon theme changes as well! 

REFERENCED:
► https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/6281/wallpaper-slideshow/
► https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/7502/auto-accent-colour/
